Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TraceData" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="VmName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="VmId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="StackFrameCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StackFrame" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64" count="StackFrameCount"/> <data name="ModuleCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <struct name="Module" count="ModuleCount"> <data name="Name" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="BaseAddress" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="SizeOfImage" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="TimeDateStamp" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </struct> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TraceData" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="VmName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="VmId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="StackFrameCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StackFrame" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64" count="StackFrameCount"/> <data name="ModuleCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <struct name="Module" count="ModuleCount"> <data name="Name" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="BaseAddress" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="SizeOfImage" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="TimeDateStamp" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </struct> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TraceData" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="VmName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="VmId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="StackFrameCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StackFrame" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64" count="StackFrameCount"/> <data name="ModuleCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <struct name="Module" count="ModuleCount"> <data name="Name" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="BaseAddress" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="SizeOfImage" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="TimeDateStamp" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </struct> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TraceData" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="VmName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="VmId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="StackFrameCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StackFrame" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64" count="StackFrameCount"/> <data name="ModuleCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <struct name="Module" count="ModuleCount"> <data name="Name" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="BaseAddress" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="SizeOfImage" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="TimeDateStamp" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </struct> </template>

Event.Message: '%1': Virtual PMEM device '%3' is mapped into virtual machine address space at base address %4, size %5 bytes. (Virtual machine ID %2)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VmName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="VmId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Locator" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="BaseAddress" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="Size" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> </template>

Event.Message: '%1': Virtual PMEM device '%3' failed to start. Error: '%4' (%5). (Virtual machine ID %2)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VmName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="VmId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="String" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorCodeString" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Param1" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Param2" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: '%1': Saving, live-migrating or creating a checkpoint of a virtual machine with persistent memory devices is not supported. Error: '%4' (%5). (Virtual machine ID %2)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VmName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="VmId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="String" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorCodeString" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Param1" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Param2" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: '%1': Virtual PMEM device '%3' must be located on a DAX-enabled volume to be successfully mapped into the virtual machine address space. Error: '%4' (%5). (Virtual machine ID %2)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VmName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="VmId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="String" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorCodeString" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Param1" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Param2" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: '%1': This virtual machine has been configured with a virtual PMEM device. Virtual PMEM is a preview feature and is not recommended for production use. (Virtual machine ID %2)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VmName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="VmId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: '%1': This virtual machine has been configured with a Physically backed PMEM controller non-DAX backing store. (Virtual machine ID %2)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VmName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="VmId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>
